name: Slime in the space time continuum
name_original: Slime in the space time continuum
description:
You play as a small slime collecting his missing slime balls while also trying to prevent an alien invasion.

Controls:

Move - [WASD]

Fire arrows- [CLICK LEFT MOUSE BUTTON]

Start and Restart- [SPACE]

  • All assets made in Blender 3D
  • Submitted to the Game Off 2018 game jam
